body:
The Master Termination Log incorporates terminations received through January 31, including prepetition mutual terminations. New entries include:

- Atlantic Coast Fibers, Inc.
- CNC-Containers Corporation
- Public Utility District No. 1 of Chelan County
- Connect Energy Services, Inc.
- NGL Supply, Inc.
- Plains Marketing, L.P. (2 transactions)

John Suttle will send an email to the following credit group members regarding the May 5th lunch: Bill Bradford, Debbie Brackett, Tanya Rohauer, Rod Nelson, Russell Diamond, Veronica Espinoza, Tracy Ngo, Brant Reves, Kevin Radous, Tom Moran, Christopher Smith, Lesli Campbell, Cathy Tudon, Nidia Martinez, Molly Harris, Edward Sacks, Brad Schneider, and Wendi LeBrocq. Suzanne, who will not attend, should check if Cathy Tudon and Nidia Martinez received the email.

Ben Hendon has completed business school applications and will finish interviews with Columbia, Rice, and Duke soon. Ben is awaiting notice from NYU. Ben recently attended a party in St. Barts with a friend and plans to host a party for Gioffre and others upon his return. Ben will share the outcome of his applications when available.
Yesterday's data was provided instead of current prices for the next day's gas day. Today's file contains the correct data.

Send the form to Marvin without editing it. Kay thinks they will have questions about specific clauses. They include liquidated damages, events of default, billing and payment netting, and the arbitration venue. Kay had formatting challenges and was unable to redline the document.
